channel.title: Lil' RS2 unlimited running trick
channel.description:
NOTE: This used to work on the official Runescape servers. But I recently checked and it didn't work anymore.
Anyways, to always run even without energy just hold ctrl.
Your energy will go down tp 0% but you can still run. Maybe this can be fixed? Until then happy exploiting.
